summary:
Aela the Huntress family is back and they want blood. 

-3 different followers with custom armors and UNP or CBBE options. They are stand alone, no more mods needed.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41669-1-1378666851.jpg[/img]

\"My mother was a Companion. And her mother. And all the women in my family. Ma didn\'t live long enough to see me join, but I fight to honor her and all my Shield-Sisters through time.\"

Aela`s family is back. Once rejected for being a werewolf, her sisters have returned to Skyrim to help the Dragonborn in his quest.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41669-1-1378667040.jpg[/img]

[size=2][b][color=NavajoWhite]Flece:[/color][/b][/size] She is a little ranger, she likes bows but also can use sparks spell. She also is a master in lockpicking. She spent the last years searching treasures for all Tamriel. 

[size=2][b][color=NavajoWhite]Tara:[/color][/b][/size] A mercenary, hired as a bounty hunter, bodyguard, carriages escort,.. she likes to draw blood. The years of fights are reflected in her face. \"Why have only one sword when you can use two?\"

[size=2][b][color=NavajoWhite]Maia:[/color][/b][/size] Serious and confident. She spent past years teaching her magic in different colleges. She hates swords or bows and likes to blow up things with lighting spells.

--------

Well this is my first followers mod. Tried to make them different, pure ranger, warrior and mage npcs. They are lvl 5, with different voices, marriageable and essential with many perks/spells according to their description. I will hear any ideas to make them even more different. They also have custom armors with some enchantments.

[size=2][b][color=Turquoise]Light Foot (they won\'t trigger pressure plates):[/color][/b][/size] Flece with her thief skills and Maia with her special magic sense have the perk.

Flece is a little inspired in The Summoner caracter with same name. If people likes mod i will try Rosalind and perhaps the Ningheim Race or any other.

No extra mods needed, they are stand alone. I tried to use cloaks of skyrim mod to give Flece one but failed (im CK noob).

[size=4][b][color=NavajoWhite]Update 1:[/color][/b][/size]
- Fixed Tara and Flece hair.

[size=4][b][color=LawnGreen]Installation:[/color][/b][/size]
- Download the follower you want and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click \"yes\" when prompted. Then activate the .esp file.

[size=4][b][color=LawnGreen]Where they are?:[/color][/b][/size]
- Wandering in Riverwood.

[size=4][b][color=LawnGreen]Permissions:[/color][/b][/size]
- Please do not upload the mod to other websites since not all the work is mine. If you want make any change to it just ask. 

[size=4][b][color=LawnGreen]Recomended mods:[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] to manage your followers, stats, inventory, etc..

The pics are taken with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37978/?]Performance and Realistic ENB[/url] high settings + realistic upgrade.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41669-5-1378668628.jpg[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41669-1-1378669220.jpg[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41669-2-1378669220.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b][color=LawnGreen]Credits:[/color][/b][/size]
- I want to thanks all the modders and mods that motivated me to make this mod.

[url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/31455]RGMs Navatar Race[/url]
